conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined wall thickness and floor planes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful; all rooms, including the detached garage, are present. Minor window placement variations on the left facade.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry, bathroom fixtures, and laundry appliances match the 2D plan well. Missing loose furniture elements like the dining table/sofa.

visual_clarity.notes: High rendering quality with consistent light and materials. Clean background.

detected_errors.description: Additional windows added to the lounge and bedroom 2 walls not present in the original 2D plan.
Lounge and Dining areas lack furniture shown/implied in spatial labels.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation that strictly adheres to the provided architectural floor plan.
